definition: fixed/unalterable
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
(negative prefix)/not/no
two/2/(Beijing dialect) stupid
has eyes but can't see (idiom); unable or unwilling to see the importance of sth/blind (to sth great)
to say one thing and do another (idiom)
tongues are wagging (idiom)
every drop returns to the public good (idiom); not one penny is misused
to praise sb in his presence
to start on virtue but give up (idiom); to fail to carry things through/lack of sticking power/short attention span
worn out in body and soul (idiom)
the morning dew will swiftly dissipate (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
lit. ask passers-by how to build one's house (idiom); fig. to have no idea what to do/without a clue
deceived by a pretense of reason (idiom)
to give cause for gossip
vicious talk/malicious tongue
see 聰明一世，糊塗一時|聪明一世，糊涂一时[cong1 ming5 yi1 shi4 , hu2 tu5 yi1 shi2]
pinyin: cong1 ming5 yi1 shi4 , meng3 dong3 yi1 shi2

definition: lit. to buy smiles to seek happiness/abandon oneself to the pleasures of the flesh (idiom)
to stir up trouble
to cling to the rich and powerful (idiom); to advance one's career by currying favor/social climbing
